到達目標: 英文欄参照/Refer to the following
授業方法: In principle, this class will be face-to-face and all class materials, tasks, and explanations will be posted in a Google Classroom dedicated to this class. However, the COIL tasks include a blend of asynchronous tasks on Padlet and synchronous tasks on Zoom with students based in Southeast Asia. The course format may include the following:- Individual, pair, and group discussion based on topics that relate to content - Sharing of information, including weekly homework assignments, on Google Classroom- Presentation and homework assignments- All components conducted in English- As a level 1 course, all English tasks expected to be completed at an intermediate level

第1回:
**The schedule below is an example of what the course will look like. Specific contents will not be decided upon until after a needs analysis is done (during first class) to determine the interests, backgrounds, and needs of enrolled students. If there is no COIL component to this class, then the below schedule will change.**

Week 1: Class overview, introductions, ice breakers

In principle, all 14 sessions will be conducted face to face
Needs Analysis Survey: 1 hour
第2回: Week 2: Introduction to culture: what is Japanese culture? Discuss first 220-word journal; plan COIL task 1 - introduction videos

For non-COIL classes, students will need to submit a journal of at least 220 words based on discussion questions related to the topic.
Journal 1: 1-2 hours
第3回: Week 3: COIL task #2 - "a day in my life" video on Padlet; prepare for live Zoom session with students from Southeast Asia.
第4回: Week 4: COIL task #3 - live Zoom session with students from Southeast Asia to discuss "a day in my life"
COIL task #2 "a day in my life" video: 2-3 hours
第5回: Week 5: COIL task #4 - post cultural identity and stereotype video to Padlet
COIL task #4 cultural identity and stereotype video: 2-3 hours
第6回: Week 6: COIL task #5 - live Zoom session with students from Southeast Asia to discuss cultural identity and stereotype videos
第7回: Week 7: Introduction of autobiography of intercultural encounters (AIE)
第8回: Complete (1) the encounter, and (2) the other person or people: 1-2 hours
第9回: Complete (3) your feelings, and (4) the other person's feelings: 1-2 hours
第10回: Complete (5) the same and different, and (6) talking to each other: 1-2 hours
第11回: Complete (7) finding out more, (8) using comparisons to understand, and (9) thinking back and looking forward: 1-2 hours
